body: In Fusil de Chispas [es], Cristian Cambronero writes about how the Costa Rican film "El Regreso" ("The Return") is using crowdfunding through Kickstarter to try to raise $40,000 USD by April 2.
original_body: In Fusil de Chispas [es], Cristian Cambronero writes about how the Costa Rican film "El Regreso" ("The Return") is using crowdfunding through Kickstarter to try to raise $40,000 USD by April 2.
title: Costa Rica: Crowdfunding Costa Rican Film "El Regreso"
